articles.title: Twitter to let publishers charge users per article read, says Elon Musk - The Guardian
articles.description: Musk calls the one-click move a win for both the public and media organisations
articles.content: Twitter CEO Elon Musk said on Saturday that the social media platform will allow media publishers to charge users on a per-article basis with one click, calling it a win for both the public and media… [+2872 chars]
